responsibilities: Conduct collaborative research with faculty to be presented at academic forums and published in peer-reviewed academic journals.
Collect data and conduct statistical analysis.
Conduct literature reviews and perform research.
Use subject matter and best practices knowledge to perform lab and/or research-related duties and tasks.
Work independently to assist with project design.
Guide data collection, evaluation, and analysis.
Perform other related work as needed.
skills: Proficiency in R, Python, or Matlab.
Organizational and attention to detail skills.
Ability to work independently with little supervision.
Ability to identify opportunities for improvement and recommend effective changes.
analysis: The job responsibilities primarily focus on conducting research, data collection, statistical analysis, literature reviews, and writing reports and manuscripts. These tasks are typical of a research assistant or analyst role in an academic or scientific setting. The skills required include proficiency in programming languages like R, Python, or Matlab, which are commonly used for data analysis and statistical computing. There is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI or language models. The tasks and skills do not specifically indicate the use of GenAI or LLMs, as they are more aligned with traditional data analysis and research methodologies.
